item.description: Hello, i am ABH. o/ I am addicted to Cybersecurity challenge of any kind ( s/o Root-me ) I also do CTFs in my spare time with the teams : RootMeUpBeforeYouGoGo and A<3. I am a french student in the -awesome- Master Cybersecurity @ Université de Paris and i am doing an internship @ Société Générale as a Cybersecurity Expert. The goal of this website is to aggregate my writeups -and maybe some articles- about infosec.
